issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Strong supporter of the Biden infrastructure plan, advocating for significant federal investment in transportation, broadband, and community infrastructure

issues.title: Healthcare Access
issues.description: Supports expanding Affordable Care Act, reducing prescription drug costs, and protecting coverage for pre-existing conditions

issues.title: Racial Justice
issues.description: Committed to addressing systemic racism, supporting police reform, and advancing equity in economic and social opportunities

issues.title: Climate Change
issues.description: Advocates for clean energy investments, supports Green New Deal principles, and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Voting Rights
issues.description: Strong proponent of federal voting rights legislation, opposing voter suppression and supporting expanded access to voting

issues.title: Economic Equity
issues.description: Supports raising minimum wage, expanding job training programs, and creating economic opportunities in underserved communities

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanded access to higher education
